alert.note: Alert for Upper Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 2:42PM PST until January 18 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 16 to 28 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Upper Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest. * WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: Upper Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest
